resources.string: Setup your Bank Account to get your rewards from Menu
Enter bank account details to redeem this cashback.
Sorry, we are facing a technical problem. Please try again after some time.
Congratulations!!! setup bank account to get reward.
Due to technical issue your reward is on hold. Our team will solve the issue soon. Please claim again in 3 days.
Setup bank account to get reward.
Add customers and minimum 2 transactions on different days.
Your gifts will be displayed in Rewards section.
This bank account or UPI already exist on some other user. Please submit correct details or use another account.
Your Bank account is not active anymore. Please use another account or make your account active again.
You have exceeded the reward claim limit for today. Please claim again tomorrow.
Your bank is not processing payment request right now. Please try again after few hours.
We are processing your reward. Please check again in 3 days.
